about_the_game:
You’ve probably never played a game like this before. It’s a story set in the world of Japanese idols, presented in an RPG format.It will be a completely new experience for you.

Story

This is the story of 'Asuka Kagami' and her journey to becoming a top idol.The game begins with the entrance ceremony at an idol academy.Asuka attends daily lessons and often finds herself involved in various incidents.Will she be able to achieve her dreams of becoming a top idol through hard work, friendship, and the glory of victory.

Characters

Asuka Kagami is the protagonist of this story. She has long, purple hair and an introverted personality, but she excels at singing.

Momoka is cheerful and talented at dancing.

Maria is a beautiful blonde model. However, she often skips classes, which has earned her a reputation as a troublemaker.

Gloria is a top idol.

System

This game is an JRPG. Asuka improves her singing, dancing, and cuteness stats through lessons. These parameters contribute to her Idol Level, which represents her combat strength. In live shows, she faces off against rivals in stage battles.

During battles, skills utilizing singing, dancing, and visual (cuteness) abilities can be employed. You’ll need to consider compatibility with opponents, but the game is designed to be easy, and there’s a retry function available during boss battles.

Features

Set in an idol academy, this is a passionate story of friendship and victory. By the time you reach the ending, you'll feel satisfied with the narrative.

Several songs featured in the game are original. Great music is essential to any idol story.

The game's difficulty is easy, and if you are defeated, you can retry.

It is expected to take around 10 hours to reach the ending.

The text has been translated using AI with manual adjustments.
